item.description:
Hi ladies,

I know this is where we just had our last Meet Up but everyone really seemed to have a great time and we all had so much fun dancing. I was going to schedule it for the 12th but not sure if people have V-day plans for the weekend. Peronally, I will most likely be sitting eating Chinese watching Two and a Half Men re-runs:-) Hopefully this date and time works and maybe we can pow-wow about when and where to schedule the next shindig.

Hoping you can all attend!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I will do the same thing I always do- send out an email day of and let you know what I will be wearing:-)
item.name: Charlie Horse again!!!!! Live Band TBD soon
